title: IBM DAP - Dynamic Assessment Plugin for Chrome Developer Tools
creator: IBM Accessibility Research
description: High-performance plugin integrates automated accessibility checking with developer tools.  DAP quickly scans modern web applications, identifies accessibility issues, and recommends potential fixes so you understand how to correct violations.  Covers WCAG 2.0 conformance, include WAI-ARIA markup.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
